definition: sung performance/to sing for an audience
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: Let's go to the megastar's singing performance, shall we?
sentences.chinese: 我们去听那个天王巨星的演唱会，好吗？

sentences.english: I couldn't understand a single word. … You could have been singing in Norwegian.
sentences.chinese: 我一个字也听不懂，你概略在用挪威语演唱吧。

sentences.english: A: I heard you had great seats for the Three Tenors concert in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 我听说你买到了世界三大男高音北京演唱会的好票。

sentences.english: Can you describe one of the best concerts you have ever seen?
sentences.chinese: 你可以描述一下迄今为止你看过的最好的演唱会吗？

sentences.english: Soon after, she began singing the national anthem regularly for Philadelphia's professional sports teams.
sentences.chinese: 稍后，她就开始经常为费城专业运动队演唱国歌。

sentences.english: He was scheduled to begin a series of 1550 comeback concerts in London.
sentences.chinese: 原计划他在伦敦会进行50场的复出演唱会。

sentences.english: "We are ready" from the Stars Concert.
sentences.chinese: 王芳群星演唱的《我们准备好了》。

sentences.english: Choosing between a new sweater and a pair of concert tickets?
sentences.chinese: 是买件新外套还是两张去演唱会的票？

sentences.english: Each singer must take an active part in the performance.
sentences.chinese: 在歌唱的艺术表现中，每个演唱者还必须积极投入。

sentences.english: The pop group has been active for the past 20nyears.
sentences.chinese: 这个流行歌曲演唱队近20年来一直活跃在舞台上。

sentences.english: The third, Hubei Jiangguiying to a new generation of folk singers singing inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 蒋桂英湖北民歌演唱给新一代演唱者的启示。

sentences.english: The third, Hubei Jiangguiying to a new generation of folk singers singing inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 蒋桂英湖北民歌演唱给新一代演唱者的启示。

sentences.english: I really enjoyed the Enya concert.
sentences.chinese: 我真的喜欢恩雅的演唱会。

sentences.english: When Peng Liyuan begins to sing, 16 actresses in Tibetan clothes accompany her with dance.
sentences.chinese: 彭丽媛演唱，十六名藏族服饰的女演员为她伴舞。

sentences.english: "Vocal Music Theory"is the first system theoretical monographs of vocal art in Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《唱论》是我国元代一部声乐演唱理论专著。

sentences.english: Her singing sometimes sonorous, powerful, sometimes soft lyrical.
sentences.chinese: 她的演唱时而铿锵有力，时而柔美抒情。

definition: to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
to compose a piece of music
vocal accompaniment/to accompany a singer/to support of sb/to echo sb/to chime in with sb
